TERM: Artificial General Intelligence

DEFINITION:
Artificial General Intelligence: Cognitive Architectures:

Neural Networks:

Evolutionary Algorithms:

By integrating advanced AGI technologies into the SPR_compressor system, we can enable the system to learn and adapt to new situations and environments, enhancing its ability to support decision-making and problem-solving.

Another potential area for exploration is the integration of advanced blockchain and distributed ledger technologies to enable the system to provide secure and transparent data management and transactions.
